features.title: Personalized Documents
features.description: AI analyzes your unique story and creates compelling SOPs and essays that stand out
features.imagePrompt: Clean UI mockup showing a document editor with AI suggestions, highlighting key phrases in a SOP. Modern interface with purple gradient accents, split-screen showing before/after document quality. Professional, detailed, high-fidelity design.

features.title: Smart Program Matching
features.description: Discover programs that perfectly align with your profile, preferences, and career goals
features.imagePrompt: Dashboard UI showing university cards with match percentage scores (85%, 92%, 78%) displayed prominently. Map visualization with pins, filtering options, and clean typography. Modern design with blue-purple gradients.

features.title: Application Automation
features.description: Automated deadline tracking, document management, and submission reminders in one place
features.imagePrompt: Calendar-style interface showing application deadlines with color-coded status indicators (pending, completed, upcoming). Kanban board view with application cards. Clean, organized, professional UI design with subtle animations.

faqs.question: How does the AI generate personalized documents?
faqs.answer: Our AI analyzes your profile, academic background, and target programs to create unique, compelling SOPs and essays that highlight your strengths and align with university requirements.

faqs.question: Can I use EduLens for multiple countries?
faqs.answer: Yes! EduLens supports applications to 50+ countries including USA, UK, Canada, Australia, Germany, and more. Our AI adapts to different application requirements.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial for the Pro plan. No credit card required. You can explore all features and cancel anytime.

faqs.question: How accurate is the program matching?
faqs.answer: Our AI achieves 95% accuracy by analyzing thousands of data points including your profile, preferences, admission statistics, and program requirements.

faqs.question: Can I get help from human experts?
faqs.answer: Premium plan includes 1-on-1 consultations with study abroad experts. Pro and Starter users have access to our community and email support.
